TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TaskCompletionSource`1<TResult> extends System.Object
generic <typename TResult> public ref class TaskCompletionSource

typeparam.name: TResult
typeparam.span: 与此 关联的结果值的类型。

span.span: The type of the result value assocatied with this .

summary.span: 表示未绑定到委托的 的制造者方，并通过 属性提供对使用者方的访问。

span.span: Represents the producer side of a unbound to a delegate, providing access to the consumer side through the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在许多情况下，它可用于启用来表示外部的异步操作。In many scenarios, it is useful to enable a to represent an external asynchronous operation. 出于此目的提供。 is provided for this purpose. 它允许创建一个任务，它可以将分发给使用者，并且这些使用者可以使用该任务的成员，像任何其他。It enables the creation of a task that can be handed out to consumers, and those consumers can use the members of the task as they would any other. 但是，不同于大多数任务，并由创建的任务的状态显式由控制上并的方法。However, unlike most tasks, the state of a task created by a TaskCompletionSource is controlled explicitly by the methods on TaskCompletionSource. 这使外部的异步操作传播到基础任务完成。This enables the completion of the external asynchronous operation to be propagated to the underlying Task. 隔离还可确保使用者不能转换没有相应的并访问权限的状态。The separation also ensures that consumers are not able to transition the state without access to the corresponding TaskCompletionSource. 有关详细信息，请参阅文章[并性质\](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2009/06/02/9685804.aspx)中使用.NET 博客进行并行编程。For more information, see the entry [The Nature of TaskCompletionSource\](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/pfxteam/archive/2009/06/02/9685804.aspx) in the Parallel Programming with .NET blog. [并行扩展示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=165717)还包含有关如何使用示例。The [Parallel Extensions samples](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=165717) also contain examples of how to use . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用:The following example shows how to use a : [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.taskcompletionsource/cs/taskcompletionsource.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.TaskCompletionSource#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.taskcompletionsource/vb/taskcompletionsource.vb#01)]

threadsafe.span: 所有成员是线程安全的可从多个线程同时使用。

span.span: All members of are thread-safe and may be used from multiple threads concurrently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使使用者可以访问受此实例。This property enables a consumer to access the that is controlled by this instance. 当你创建对象，此属性对象返回 When you create a object, the property of this object returns ， ， ，和方法 （和其"Try"的变体） 对此实例上的相关状态转换中的所有结果基础任务。The , , , and methods (and their "Try" variants) on this instance all result in the relevant state transitions on this underlying Task.

summary.span: 尝试将基础 转换为 状态。

span.span: Attempts to transition the underlying into the state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool TrySetCanceled() cil managed

summary.span: 尝试将基础 转换为 状态。

span.span: Attempts to transition the underlying into the state.

returns.span: 如果操作成功，则为 true；如果操作失败或对象已被释放，则为 false。

span.span: True if the operation was successful; false if the operation was unsuccessful or the object has already been disposed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作将返回 false 如果已在三种的最终状态之一： ， ，或。This operation will return false if the is already in one of the three final states: , , or . 此方法也返回 false，如果基础已释放。This method also returns false if the underlying has already been disposed.
